title: project skins
body: riot said that if we got the project skins together we can get the ward skin and icon for 1rp i played a game with all 5 project skins and got nothing i dont know if i did something wrong or what.

replies.body: They meant if you bought the whole bundle for the project skins you'll get the Ward skins and icons for 1 rp.

Hiya! 

If you purchased the **Alpha Set** which is all PROJECT skins, you'd receive the ward skin and icon for 1 IP.  This doesn't count if you load into a game with all PROJECT skins.
